content: maple leaf pattern designed by kimiko @kimikoami materials yarn in various colours of your choice 2 5mm crochet hook tapestry needle abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet skip - skip st/sts - stitch/stitches slip_stitch - slip_stitch repeat - repeat pattern centre of leaf worked in joined rounds r1 12 half_double_crochet in magic_ring 12 sts r2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same st 2 half_double_crochet in each st around 24 sts including chain leaf and stem r3 skip next st 7 double_crochet in next st skip next st slip_stitch in next st * repeat 5 times single_crochet in next 2 sts chain 11 turn and single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across single_crochet in next last 2 sts r4 single_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next 2 sts in next st 2 double_crochet chain 3 fold and slip_stitch on first chain to form picot 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in next st slip_stitch in next st * repeat 5 times fasten_off and weave in end designed by kimiko @kimikoami page 1/2 i hope you enjoyed this pattern i d love to see the results of your hard work please share photos of your finished creation by tagging me on instagram @kimikoami if you liked this pattern please check out my online shops for more etsy https //www etsy com/shop/kimikoami ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/kimikoami copyright notes please do not sell this pattern duplicate or distribute it in any way shape or form you are welcome to sell products made from this pattern but please clearly credit the design to kimiko from kimiko ami and provide a link to my etsy shop https //www etsy com/shop/kimikoami my ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/kimikoami or instagram @kimikoami permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind thank you for being respectful and for your understanding happy crocheting designed by kimiko @kimikoami page 2/2
